page.title: 19WORSHIP IN KNOTTINGLEY AREA
page.content: The Parish Church in{Knottingley is the Church of St Botolph.A Church group also meets once a month at Simpson's Lane Community Centre.The Roman Catholic Church is St Michael's. There are two Methodist Churches, Ropewalk,which is the main one,and the smaller chapel at Forge Hill.There is the United Reformed Church,the Salavation Army Citadel,and the Elim Tabernacle,a Pentecostal church. The Parish Church in{Brotherton}is dedicated to St Edward the Confessor. There is also the United Reformed church.The Methodists have no church building but meet weekly at a church member's home. The church of St Andrew,Ferry Fryston was removed stone by stone from the marsh and rebuilt in{Ferrybridge village in 1953.There is a Methodist church on Doncaster Road,Ferrybridge.
